Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $12000 to you. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this item from me. My proposal is to sell it to you for $11000. This price reflects my commitment to making high-quality products accessible while ensuring a fair return for my efforts and investment. I trust this offer will be favorable and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
